issues.description: Hero 60/40 split may push CTA below fold on laptops with shorter screens
issues.rationale: Critical conversion loss if primary action requires scrolling on common 1366x768 displays

issues.description: Single hero CTA removes fallback conversion path for hesitant users
issues.rationale: Eliminating secondary action may reduce total conversions despite reducing choice paralysis

issues.description: Sticky CTA at 40% scroll triggers too late for impatient mobile users
issues.rationale: Users may bounce before reaching trigger point, missing conversion opportunity entirely

issues.description: 3-step horizontal stepper may not fit on smaller desktop screens
issues.rationale: Horizontal overflow forces scrolling, breaking the scanning flow and reducing comprehension

issues.description: Audit log table with 8 rows creates excessive vertical scroll on mobile
issues.rationale: Trust section becomes too long, pushing pricing and CTA further down conversion funnel

issues.description: 3-plan pricing cards may require horizontal scrolling on tablets
issues.rationale: Pricing comprehension drops when users must scroll to compare all options side by side

issues.description: Before/after two-column layout lacks clear visual separator
issues.rationale: Users may not immediately grasp the comparison without stronger visual distinction

issues.description: 8px border radius may feel too sharp for premium positioning
issues.rationale: Slightly rounded corners could feel more approachable and less corporate

issues.description: Light gray background may reduce contrast for accessibility compliance
issues.rationale: WCAG contrast requirements may not be met with #F7F7F7 background on certain text colors

issues.description: 20px button padding may create oversized CTAs that dominate visual hierarchy
issues.rationale: Large buttons may overwhelm other page elements and feel aggressive rather than inviting

suggestedFixes.fix: Test hero height at 480px max on desktop to ensure CTA visibility above 768px fold
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees primary action remains visible on most common laptop screen sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep single primary CTA but add subtle text link below for demo/trial option
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains clear hierarchy while providing low-friction alternative for uncertain users

suggestedFixes.fix: Trigger sticky CTA after 20% scroll or 3 seconds on page, whichever comes first
suggestedFixes.rationale: Captures more impatient users while avoiding premature interruption of reading flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Use responsive stepper: 3 columns on desktop 1200px+, vertical stack below 1200px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures process visibility across all screen sizes without horizontal scrolling

suggestedFixes.fix: Limit audit log to 4 rows on mobile with 'View more' expansion option
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces initial scroll length while maintaining trust signal accessibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack pricing cards vertically on screens below 900px width instead of 768px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Prevents horizontal scrolling on tablets while maintaining readability

suggestedFixes.fix: Add vertical divider line or contrasting background colors between before/after columns
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates clear visual separation to enhance comparison comprehension

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase border radius to 12px for softer, more premium feel across components
suggestedFixes.rationale: Balances modern aesthetics with approachable design for better brand positioning

suggestedFixes.fix: Use #F9F9F9 background instead of #F7F7F7 to improve contrast ratios
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains clean aesthetic while ensuring WCAG AA compliance for accessibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Reduce button padding to 16px vertical, 24px horizontal for balanced proportions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates prominent but not overwhelming CTAs that integrate better with page hierarchy
